snippet: The grounding of Boeing’s 787 jetliner because of battery trouble has meant delayed new services and scheduling headaches for airlines.
abstract: Airlines are canceling more flights and adjusting their routes out of concern that it could be several more months before uncertain fate of Boeing 787 and its battery issues are resolved.

byline.original: By JAD MOUAWAD and CHRISTOPHER DREW

lead_paragraph: The grounding of Boeing’s 787 jetliner because of battery trouble has meant delayed new services and scheduling headaches for airlines.

headline.seo: Concern and Canceled Flights as Airlines Wait for 787
headline.main: Concern and Canceled Flights as Airlines Wait for 787
headline.print_headline: More Flight Cancellations As Airlines Wait for 787
